SEARCH
Modul de.hitec.nhplus
Package de.hitec.nhplus.controller

Klasse AllPatientController

java.lang.Object
de.hitec.nhplus.utils.LockingObjects
de.hitec.nhplus.controller.AllPatientController
public class AllPatientController extends LockingObjects
The AllPatientController contains the entire logic of the patient view. It determines which data is displayed and how to react to events.

  • Methodendetails

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      When initialize() gets called, all fields are already initialized. For example from the FXMLLoader after loading an FXML-File. At this point of the lifecycle of the Controller, the fields can be accessed and configured.

    • handleOnEditFirstname

      public void handleOnEditFirstname(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      When a cell of the column with first names was changed, this method will be called, to persist the change.
      Parameter:
      event - Event including the changed object and the change.

    • handleOnEditSurname

      public void handleOnEditSurname(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      When a cell of the column with surnames was changed, this method will be called, to persist the change.
      Parameter:
      event - Event including the changed object and the change.

    • handleOnEditDateOfBirth

      public void handleOnEditDateOfBirth(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      When a cell of the column with dates of birth was changed, this method will be called, to persist the change.
      Parameter:
      event - Event including the changed object and the change.

    • handleOnEditCareLevel

      public void handleOnEditCareLevel(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.CellEditEvent<Patient,String> event)
      When a cell of the column with care levels was changed, this method will be called, to persist the change.
      Parameter:
      event - Event including the changed object and the change.

    • handleDelete

      public void handleDelete()
      This method handles events fired by the button to delete patients. It calls PatientDao to delete the patient from the database and removes the object from the list, which is the data source of the TableView.

    • handleLock

      public void handleLock()
      Handles the lock operation for the currently selected patient in the table view. The lock operation assigns a locking date (current date plus 10 years) to the selected patient and updates the patient information in the database.

    • handleAdd

      public void handleAdd()
      This method handles the events fired by the button to add a patient. It collects the data from the TextFields, creates an object of class Patient of it and passes the object to PatientDao to persist the data.

    • getCurrentDate

      protected Calendar getCurrentDate()
      Saves the current date in a variable.
      Angegeben von:
      getCurrentDate in Klasse LockingObjects
      Gibt zurück:
      The current date as a Calendar object.

    • getActualDateInTenYears

      protected String getActualDateInTenYears()
      Returns the current date and adds 10 years to it.
      Gibt zurück:
      The date in ten years as a string.

    • checkIfAboveLegalLockDate

      protected boolean checkIfAboveLegalLockDate()
      Checks if the current date is within the legal patient's lock date.
      Angegeben von:
      checkIfAboveLegalLockDate in Klasse LockingObjects
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the current date is on or after the lock date false otherwise.

    • isObjectLocked

      protected boolean isObjectLocked()
      Checks if a patient is locked or not.
      Angegeben von:
      isObjectLocked in Klasse LockingObjects
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the patient is locked, false otherwise.

    • archiveObject

      protected void archiveObject()
      Archives the selected patient object. This method is intended to be overridden in subclasses to implement specific archiving logic. Currently, this method does not perform any operations and is left empty.
      Angegeben von:
      archiveObject in Klasse LockingObjects
